document_data.name: ''Off the Map!''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Off the Map!''''', also known by its full title ''Off the Map: A Pirate's Guide to Stand-up Comedy'', was a book popular among pirates of the [[Sea of Swords]] and [[Nelanther Islands]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Contents: Apparently, despite what the back cover claimed, ''Off the Map!'' was not that funny.
document_data.History: This lackluster book was often found in homes and establishments frequented by pirates of the Sea of Swords. It was often sold by vendors of [[Spindrift Town]] ''circa'' 1372 DR.
